title: How intelligent is Bono from U2? - Quora

response.answer_text: Well, for a rock songwriter, singer, and performer from a young age—he joined U2 when he was 15—and for someone who may have not finished high school, he’s become fairly intelligent over the years. I first heard him during a 90-minute radio interview show on 17 December 1984, and, when I heard him, I thought huh, I didn’t know rock singers could be intelligent (I was 17 at the time). At that time, for most rock-band members, appearing intelligent to their fans—think “nerdy”—was absolutely to be avoided. Yet, here was this twenty-four-year-old guy in a rock band which was not yet popular and which had just released their fourth album a couple months earlier, and he had no qualms about coming across as intelligent to his fans or to the public. By all accounts, he is a reader.

How intelligent is Bono from U2? I have made a detailed scientific study of these people particularly the clown who calls himself ‘Edge’ or some such pretentious nonsense. From my studies I would say that Bonzo has an intellect somewhere between a parasitic amoeba and a dead camel. L G
